participant_1.background:
I am happy to be with my family, even if they are all grown up.
I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
i am the oldest sibling.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
My music is my escape.

participant_2.background:
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.
i play the drums.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.

content.text: Hi! I'm good, thanks. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What are your hobbies?
I like to play the drums, go on hikes with my dogs, and spend time with my husband.
That sounds awesome! I love hiking too. Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs, they're the best! What's your favorite music genre?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock. What's your favorite type of comic?
I love graphic novels! I'm really into superhero comics right now.
I love graphic novels too! I'm not really into superheroes, but I love the art style.
I'm the oldest of 4 kids. What about you?
I have one brother, but we're not very close.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm close with all of my siblings.
Yeah, it is. But I'm close with my husband and dogs, so that's all that matters.
